segments.text: Suddenly, I spot the faucet still running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is completely full, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman hasn't turned it off, she's drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle at her feet, and she steps right in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinet, the boy's on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's dipping into the cookie jar, what a sneak.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts back, oh that's risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister reaches up, joining the fun.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames it all so normally.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect such chaos in a simple kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden looks calm, totally contrasting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene caught me off guard completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Everything seems so everyday, yet it's not.
segments.speaker: PAR
